# evb-progressbar



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description                                   | Type      | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | --------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `height`   | `height`   | The height of the bar in pixels               | `number`  | `24`        |
| `progress` | `progress` | Progress percentage                           | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `text`     | `text`     | Show the progress as text in the progress bar | `boolean` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event       | Description | Type                |
| ----------- | ----------- | ------------------- |
| `completed` |             | `CustomEvent<void>` |
